mapper.select: SELECT pp.id, pp.user_id, pp.title, pp.cover, pp.content, pp.pet_type_id, pp.summary, pp.is_audit, pp.audit_reason, pp.create_time, pt.name AS pet_type_name, u.username, u.avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM active_net an WHERE an.content_id = pp.id AND an.content_type = 'PET-POST' AND an.type = 2) AS upvote_number, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM active_net an WHERE an.content_id = pp.id AND an.content_type = 'PET-POST' AND an.type = 1) AS view_number, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM active_net an WHERE an.content_id = pp.id AND an.content_type = 'PET-POST' AND an.type = 3) AS save_number FROM pet_post pp LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = pp.user_id LEFT JOIN pet_type pt ON pt.id = pp.pet_type_id WHERE pp.id = #{id}
